vulnerabilities.title: XSS/HTML Injection Vulnerability in Umbraco Backoffice Components
vulnerabilities.description:
### Impact
Authenticated users are able to exploit an XSS vulnerability when viewing certain localized backoffice components.

### Patches
Will be patched in 14.3.2 and 15.1.2.

Note:
This issue was reported by Pratik Patil from NetSPI @Nexusss-ppatil

vulnerabilities.title: Umbraco CMS vulnerable to stored Cross-site Scripting in the "dictionary name" on Dictionary section
vulnerabilities.description:
### Impact
This can be leveraged to gain access to higher-privilege endpoints, e.g. if you get a user with admin privileges to run the code, you can potentially elevate all users and grant them admin privileges or access protected content.

### Patches
Will be patched in 14.3.1 and 15.0.0.

### Workarounds
Ensure that access to the Dictionary section is only granted to trusted users.
